record.title: AUTHORITY FOR COMMITTEES TO MEET
record.narrative:
AUTHORITY FOR COMMITTEES TO MEET -- (Senate - November 16, 2007)

[Page: S14654]

speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, I ask unanimous consent that the Senate Committee on the Judiciary be authorized to meet during the session of the Senate and continue an executive business meeting on Friday, November 16, 2007, at 9:45 a.m. in room S-216, of the Capitol.

record.chair: Without objection, it is so ordered.

speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, I ask unanimous consent for the Committee on Veterans' Affairs to be authorized to meet during the session of the Senate on Friday, November 16, 2007. The Committee will meet off the Senate Floor in the Reception Room to consider the nomination of Michael W. Hager to be an Assistant Secretary of Veterans Affairs for Human Resources and Management after the first floor vote that occurs on Friday.

record.chair: Without objection, it is so ordered.
